p: The antioxidant activities of antioxidants have been attributed to various mechanisms, and one test is normally not enough to evaluate precisely the antioxidant activity of potential antioxidant [ 11]. Therefore, we used these two assays to evaluate the total antioxidant capacity of essential oil from the C. citronella leaves. The results indicated that the essential oil had a noticeable effect on scavenging self-oxidation of 1,2,3-phentriol and were able to scavenge free radicals.
